Package com.zabzabdoda.pgl.component

Class Panel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zabzabdoda.pgl.component.Component
      • com.zabzabdoda.pgl.component.Panel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MouseListener
    public class Panel
extends Component
implements MouseListener
    Represents an area where components can be stored and drawn with its own relative coordinate system
    Author:
    zabzabdoda

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Panel​(int x, int y, int width, int height)
      Constructs a new panel at a certain position

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void add​(Component comp)
      Adds a component to the panel and sets its relative positioning to the x,y values of the panel
      void draw()
      draws the panel and all of its components to the main window
      void mouseMoved()
      calls all component mousemoved methods
      void mousePressed()
      calls all component mousemoved methods
      void mouseReleased()
      calls all component mousemoved methods
      void remove​(Component comp)
      Removes the component from the panel and resets its offset to the main frame
      void setPApplet​(processing.core.PApplet p)
      Sets the surface that all the components are drawn on

        getHeight, getWidth, getX, getY, setHeight, setWidth, setX, setY
